section.heading: Transfer of functions of Alcoholic Beverage Control Division of the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs.
section.text: All positions, property, records, and unexpended balances of appropriations, allocations, assessments, and other funds available or to be made available to the Alcoholic Beverage Control Division of the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs relating to the duties and functions assigned herein are transferred to ABRA.

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in ยง 25-207.
